FuncDef: This command specifies the revocation method system used to check the revocation status of certificate issued by the CA, the default value iscrl, which will use CRL. But if it iscrl-optional, then it means when the user disables the ca-profile, then the system will try to load the configured CRL (specified by thecrl-filecommand). However, if the system fails to load it for following reasons, then the system still brings the ca-profile oper-up, but leaves the CRL asnon-exist.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use the configured CRL.
Specifies that the CRL is optional.
